statements: SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, age FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age < 25 OR gender = 'Non-Binary' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE purchase_history->>'total_purchases' >= '100' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM Customer WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, purchase_date FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, city FROM Customer WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, city FROM Customer WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email_address FROM Customer WHERE gender = 'Male' AND city = 'New York';

SELECT customer_id, first_name, city, purchase_date, purchase_amount, product_name FROM Customer c INNER JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON c.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE ph.purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM Customer WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city, purchase_amount FROM Customer c LEFT JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON c.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount IS NULL ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM email_templates WHERE template_id < 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, city, country FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 AND country = 'USA' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM email_templates ORDER BY template_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM email_templates;
SELECT customer_name, age, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND purchase_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM email_templates WHERE template_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, occupation, income FROM customers INNER JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_name, email, location FROM customers INNER JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT city, state, country FROM demographics WHERE country = 'USA' AND state = 'CA';
SELECT template_name, subject FROM email_templates WHERE template_name LIKE '%promotion%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.price > 100 ORDER BY p.price DESC;
SELECT d.city, d.state, d.country, c.gender FROM demographics d JOIN customers c ON d.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE d.income > 50000;
SELECT e.template_name, e.subject, ce.sent_date FROM email_templates e JOIN customer_emails ce ON e.template_id = ce.template_id ORDER BY ce.sent_date DESC;
